profile.name: Leonardo Perez
profile.title: DYNAMIC IT PROFESSIONAL
profile.description: Leonardo Perez is a dynamic IT professional with over 20 years of experience, including 10+ years in Delivery Management.  His expertise lies in leading complex, cross-functional teams across diverse industries to deliver high-impact solutions aligned with business strategies.  A Certified Project Management Professional (PMP), Leonardo consistently exceeds project goals, enhances customer satisfaction, and adheres to strict timelines and budgets.  His extensive experience in Agile methodologies, spanning over a decade, encompasses facilitating Scrum ceremonies, managing project dependencies, and ensuring the successful execution of Salesforce implementations tailored to specific business needs.  His background as a Software Engineering teacher at Buenos Aires University provides valuable insights into educational methodologies and fosters a culture of continuous learning and development within his teams.  He is recognised for his ability to foster strong team collaboration, creating positive and results-oriented environments that cultivate high performance and client satisfaction.  His leadership extends to global IT projects, including ERP implementations, Salesforce transformations, and hardware service delivery initiatives spanning 120+ countries.
profile.description2: Leonardo's career showcases a consistent record of successful project delivery and leadership across various sectors.  He has spearheaded the standardization of resource planning protocols and implemented comprehensive Ways of Working (WoW) standards, resulting in enhanced project efficiency and alignment.  His expertise in Salesforce implementations is evident in his successful delivery of Salesforce Health Cloud for Cochlear Ltd, leading to improved customer experience and enhanced sales outcomes.  He has also successfully led the rollout of Agile methodologies across the Asia Pacific region, significantly reducing lead times and enhancing delivery efficiency.  His ability to manage complex projects, navigate technical challenges, and foster strong stakeholder relationships makes him a highly effective and sought-after leader in the IT industry.  He consistently demonstrates a commitment to continuous improvement, actively participating in knowledge sharing and mentoring team members to achieve optimal project outcomes and foster a culture of innovation.

qualifications: Master of Business Management and Organisation, School of Engineering, University of Buenos Aires, Argentina

Computer Science B.Sc. Degree, School of Engineering, University of Buenos Aires, Argentina (Accredited by The Australian Computer Society as equivalent to the Australian Degree of Software Engineering or Computer Science)
ITIL® V3 Foundation Cert in IT Service Management
